parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the plastic brake reservoir unit can cause a leak, leading to a short circuit, and potentially a fire, which can result in accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: complete melt down of the master brake cylinder unit/reservoir
brake fluid leaking from the plastic reservoir
and a fire starting when starting the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause extended stopping distances, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor
and intermittent problems with brake pedal application.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities due to extended stopping distances, loss of control, or locking up of the brakes.
The failure of the brake rotors can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities due to extended stopping distances, loss of control, or failure of the brakes.
The failure of the cruise control deactivation switch can cause the vehicle to catch fire, potentially leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: with flames coming from the engine compartment; the cruise control module is faulty; the vehicle speed control is affected; the brake master cylinder is melting or smoking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause the vehicle to speed out of control, potentially leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle speeds out of control; the ignition has to be switched off to stop acceleration; the cruise control unit is defective.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to repair a recall can lead to continued safety risks, including fires and accidents.
symptoms: The dealer or manufacturer refuses to perform a repair due to a lack of open recalls in the vehicle's repair history; the vehicle owner is told to pay for the repair labor and part.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical shorts can cause fires, which can lead to vehicle damage, injury, or even death.
symptoms: Smoke and fire pouring out from under the hood
fire starting under the hood on the driver's side
fire destroying the engine compartment and interior of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty cruise control harness can cause a fire while the vehicle is parked, leading to vehicle damage and potential injury.
symptoms: smoke pouring out from under the hood.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Starter motor failure can cause the vehicle to be difficult to start, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Starter motor cables and solenoid shorting out

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A defective seat design can cause the seat to collapse, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
